title: Full clipboard access in background/unfocused app state (maybe as capability)
body: Current clipboard API can notify about a clipboard content change, which is fine. But getting or setting the content doesn't work if the app is in background or unfocused. (Access Denied)

comments.body: Please let us know if you are planning to allow this.
This limitation causes that our Xamarin.Forms app is not as good for Windows as it is for Android and iOS. Ironic, considering that Microsoft owns Xamarin now.
